title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions: Introducing Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, the ultimate solution for your kitchen waste disposal needs. With a generous quantity of 50 bags, each boasting a capacity of 13 gallons, you'll have plenty to keep your space clean and tidy. The unscented, tear-resistant white plastic material and Flex-tra strength ensure durability and reliability, while the red drawstring closure adds a pop of color and makes for easy tying and carrying. Plus, with Alexa voice shopping capabilities, reordering is as simple as a voice command. Say goodbye to trash troubles and hello to convenience with Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags.
